content: poppy flower pattern by crochet road - joy clements us terms poppy flower 1 crochet road poppy flower thank you for choosing this crochet road pattern iõm so grateful youõre interested in crocheting one of my designs poppies are a symbol of remembrance and as such are suitable for anzac day memorial day or remembrance armistice day they may be made in red purple black or white for these occasions however red poppies are the most common red - flanders poppy symbolises remembrance for the fallen white - commitment to peace and remembrance of casualties purple - commemorate the animal victims of war horses dogs and pigeons black - a symbol of grief you could also choose to create these in any colour you like wear a poppy as a brooch or create decorations for the home for any time of year using very little yarn theyõre a fabulous way to use up your yarn scraps experiment with various yarns and appropriate hook sizes for different sized poppies some suggestions are given on the next page remember weõd love to see your creativity on ravelry as a project on instagram or in our crochet road community facebook group direct links to all of these are at the end of this pdf you will inspire others with your work so please share it with the world enjoy your time crocheting lots of love joy xx poppy flower 2 crochet road materials yarn & hooks used for samples & yardage
